--authrpc.jwtsecret="jwt.hex" --authrpc.addr=http://127.0.0.1 --authrpc.port=8551 \
--authrpc.vhosts="*" --http.rpcprefix=/

The above maybe having a lot of flags but i'm trying out all of them to be sure.

The issue is that the endpoint `http://127.0.0.1:8551` is unreachable although `http://127.0.0.1:8545` is reachable.
PS: My geth node is fully synced.

Any thoughts on what i maybe doing wrong?
